thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: tom sheerin

author: tom sheerin
title: tom sheerin
text: I have changed 30,000 sterling with Currency Fair with no issues. There customer service is excellent and they can explain everything in plain English. It is possible to set your own rate. Transfers in and out are very easy to complete.There fees are very low. Other similar companies deduct much greater fees, so a seemingly slightly higher exchange rate, is actually a lower rate when your money is exchanged.The banks are a rip off compared to this company.
